Topic.Title: Pokemon Type Harley Gold And Silver Thread

Posts.EditableText:
Hi. My old thread died due to inactivity.

So here are the changes I've made recently:

1. Some trainers have new names.
2. Trainers have new and different Pokemon you can battle.
3. Whitney's gym has been added. You cannot battle Whitney yet.

Overall, my game has 3 Pokemon gyms so far.

Game link here. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5jllte-m4e2e2whw4gf5jq/pokemon-type-harley-gold-and-silver

Posts.EditableText:
Hi again.

These are the changes I've made recently:

1. You can battle your rival now. His name is Silver.
2. You can battle Whitney. She has a Clefairy.
3. I fixed a glitch where Falkner cannot be battled.
4. I removed the take verb from Falkner, I think.

My game now has 3 gym leaders you can battle. My game also has a rival battle now.

Game link here. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5jllte-m4e2e2whw4gf5jq/pokemon-type-harley-gold-and-silver

Posts.EditableText:
Here are some things I've updated:

1. Harley can now sell items. Speak to him.
2. Morty's gym is open.
3. Morty's battle command was added, but you cannot battle him yet.
4. Morty's Pokemon Gengar was created. You cannot battle it yet.

I am really excited with the accomplishments I have made!
You can now battle Falkner, Bugsy, and Whitney.

Game link here. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5jllte-m4e2e2whw4gf5jq/pokemon-type-harley-gold-and-silver

Posts.EditableText:
New things I've updated:
1. Harley's items are updated.
2. Morty can now be battled.
3. New trainers can be battled.
4. The battle command was updated.
5. The Game Over prefix was fixed. It now no longer says "You are in a Game Over."
6. Gym leaders were fixed.

You can now battle Falkner, Bugsy, Whitney, and Morty.
Game link here. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5jllte-m4e2e2whw4gf5jq/pokemon-type-harley-gold-and-silver
